TITLE: Task Delegation
DEF: Assigning tasks or responsibilities to others, such as colleagues, assistants, or AI tools
TASK: The Task Delegation pattern supports the assigning of tasks or responsibilities to others, such as colleagues, peers, or AI tools, to optimize efficiency and workload. The main purpose of the pattern is to ensure effective distribution of tasks and improved productivity. To maximize the benefits of this pattern, address common issues like communication, trust, and follow-up.
